name: InfantileAndJuvenileCataract
title: Infantile and Juvenile Cataract
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent infantile and juvenile cataracts.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with infantile and juvenile cataracts.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes unspecified infantile and juvenile cataract diagnoses.)
